creator: Project First LLC
descriptionHtml:
Create your own fantastic world together with Leo the Truck! Time for Adventure!

Leo’s World is a continuation of a series of well-known games about Leo the Truck and his friends.
In our new game, children will have to create the game’s world themselves, gradually expanding its borders and possibilities within the world. Waiting for them are fun adventures with their favorite characters, many a discovery to make, educational sections in the form of various games and activities, entertaining animations and waves of positive emotion!

The game is aimed at children from the ages of 2 to 5 and comes with lots of minigames and activities to help develop children’s visual and logical thinking, fine motor skills and visual memory. They also train attention span and reaction speeds, also allowing them room for artistic self-expression and teaching them to try new things.

You’ll can always choose the desired level of difficulty and image quality in the settings menu. Your child won’t have access to all parts of the game: the settings page, shop purchases, and links to our other games are locked behind a parental control window!

You and your child will definitely enjoy the game’s lively, bright and interesting world, its easy-to-grasp gameplay, and its professional voice acting!

Locations.
Leo’s World is broken down into in-game locations and zones, each of which has many of its own in-game items. Locations are structured so that at the start of the game a number of these items will be inaccessible. By exploring the surrounding world of the game with the help of their chosen character, your child will gradually expand its borders, constantly discovering new aspects of the world – just like in real life.

Leo the Truck’s world is alive and interactive. Tell your child to explore it, to examine the objects in a location and to tap on them. There are tons of surprises and fun animations in store for them!

Ice Cream.
Feed Leo and his friends ice cream! Each character wants ice cream made from a specific fruit or berry (which the narrator will announce).
This minigame helps children learn the names of fruits, berries, and their colors.

The Car Wash.
Our car wash isn’t working. An accident’s happened nearby and the pipe’s burst. Fix the pipe using a Helper Car and get the car wash running. Choose a character and wash them down, then use the hair dryer to get them dry.
This minigame develops fine motor skills.

Coloring.
Color in pictures with the paintbrush by moving your finger or by filling in separate sections with the “bucket” tool.
This minigame allows room for artistic self-expression and teaches children to experiment.

Puzzles.
Put together the puzzle as quickly as you can!
Drag each piece to the right spot (where the puzzle edges match up with the shape of the piece), and they should automatically stick to the picture.
This minigame develops visual and logical thinking, as well as fine motor skills.

Rocket.
Find a way to get to the rocket, put it together, then head off on an exciting adventure to one of the Solar System’s many planets.
Dodge asteroids and flying saucers. Shoot at them and earn bonus awards. Try reaching planets without bumping into anything. There’ll be a surprise waiting at the end of your flight!
This minigame develops a child’s attention span and reaction speed.

Memory Cards.
Several pairs of cards are displayed on the screen with their reverse side showing. Tap on them to reveal them, trying to find the matching pairs.
This minigame trains visual memory.

Our team creates fun, high-quality, educational games and applications for young children, based on original content that we create and produce in our own animation studios. All of our content is developed while actively working alongside specialists that work with children and it has been translated into many languages.

We make our games with love and with special attention paid to children.
descriptionShort: Explore Leo's World: cars, toddler adventures & learning games for kids under 5

descriptionShort: Explore Leo's World: cars, toddler adventures & learning games for kids under 5

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Released another awesome location! "Kapu's House" location has lots of new fun activities and things to learn.
Also added new in-game events in form of natural disasters (wildfire and tornado).

title:
Leo's World: toddler adventure
1.0.17

creator: Project First LLC
descriptionHtml:
Create a new magic world with Leo! It's time for Adventure!

"Leo's World" is the new game of the well-known series of games about Leo the Truck and his friends.
In our new game, kids will create their game world themselves, gradually expanding its boundaries and possibilities. Fun adventures await them together with their favorite characters, lots of discoveries, funny animations and loads of positive emotions!

The game is intended for children from 2 to 5 years old and is full of many mini-games and activities that help develop imaginative and logical thinking, fine motor skills and visual memory. They also provide room for creative expression and teach kids to experiment themselves.
In the settings you can always select the appropriate difficulty level and image quality.
You and your child will enjoy its lively and bright world, easy-to-grasp gameplay and professional voice acting!

Leo's world is divided into game zones-locations, and each location contains many game objects. Locations are designed so that at the beginning of the game, some objects will be unavailable. By exploring around the game world your child will gradually expand their boundaries and discover new things. Just like in real life!

Encourage your child to explore this interactive world, moving across the map, exploring locations and tapping on objects. There are many surprises and fun animations waiting for them!


The "Leo's House" location

Ice Cream
Invite Leo and his friends to take a yummy ice cream!
Each character prefers an ice cream made from a specific fruit or berry.

The Car Wash
Our car wash stopped working - there was an accident nearby and a water pipe broke. Fix the pipe with your helper car and the car wash will work again!
Choose a character, wash them gently using a sponge and a watering can, then dry them off with a hair dryer.

Rocket
The launch platform and the rocket are on the other bank of the river.
Find a way to get there, build a rocket, choose one of the planets in our solar system and get on the way!
Dodge asteroids, satellites and flying saucers. You can shoot and destroy them to pick up bonus awards.
Try flying to planets without coming across into anything. At the end of the journey, a surprise awaits you!

In this location you will also find puzzles, coloring books, flashcards and many other activities!


"Skoop's house" location

Football
Let's play a football match!
Score the required amount of goals and get the winner's cup!
But this won't be easy - the football field is literally full of different objects.
Coming across a ball or a car will lead to a lot of funny situations.

Archeology
Take part in real archaeological excavations!
Help the robots to find all the pieces of ancient objects in the sand and glue them together.
Gather your own collection of unique artifacts from ancient times!

Air balloon
Take a trip in an air balloon!
You have an important mission - to deliver a gift package to one of your favorite characters.
Try to do this as fast as possible.
You have more tasks: you need to help the frogs and the kitten, run the train on the railway, repair the wind generator and much more things that require your attention.

Natural disasters
There are some natural disasters in Leo's World.
As in life, they are unpredictable and they come with consequences.
But all that can be fixed, and along with helper cars you can quickly sort out all the problems.


Our team creates fun and kind educational games for kids, based on original content that we create and produce in our own animation studios.
All our content is created with the active participation of professionals who work with children, and is translated into many languages.
descriptionShort: Explore Leo's World: cars, toddler adventures & learning games for kids under 5

Coming across a ball or a car will lead to a lot of funny situations.



Archeology


Take part in real archaeological excavations!
Help the robots to find all the pieces of ancient objects in the sand and glue them together.
Gather your own collection of unique artifacts from ancient times!



Air balloon


Take a trip in an air balloon!
You have an important mission - to deliver a gift package to one of your favorite characters.
Try to do this as fast as possible.



You have more tasks: you need to help the frogs and the kitten, run the train on the railway, repair the wind generator and much more things that require your attention.




Natural disasters


There are some natural disasters in Leo's World.
As in life, they are unpredictable and they come with consequences.
But all that can be fixed, and along with helper cars you can quickly sort out all the problems.




Our team creates fun and kind educational games for kids, based on original content that we create and produce in our own animation studios. All our content is created with the active participation of professionals who work with children, and is translated into many languages.
descriptionShort: Explore Leo's World: cars, toddler adventures & learning games for kids under 5
title:
Leo's World: toddler adventure
1.0.24

creator: Lazy Shrimp Studio - learning games for kids
descriptionHtml:
Released “Lea’s Garage” location!
New adventures with Lea: racing, hidden object search, music games, sorting junk, and other activities.

"Leo's World" is the new game of the well-known series of games about Leo the Truck and his friends.
In our new game, kids will create their game world themselves, gradually expanding its boundaries and possibilities. Fun adventures await them together with their favorite characters, lots of discoveries, funny animations and loads of positive emotions!

The game is intended for children from 2 to 5 years old and is full of many mini-games and activities that help develop imaginative and logical thinking, fine motor skills and visual memory. They also provide room for creative expression and teach kids to experiment themselves.

In the settings you can always select the appropriate difficulty level and image quality.
You and your child will enjoy its lively and bright world, easy-to-grasp gameplay and professional voice acting!

Leo's world is divided into game zones-locations, and each location contains many game objects. Locations are designed so that at the beginning of the game, some objects will be unavailable. By exploring around the game world your child will gradually expand their boundaries and discover new things. Just like in real life!

Encourage your child to explore this interactive world, moving across the map, exploring locations and tapping on objects. There are many surprises and fun animations waiting for them!


Location “Leo’s House”.
In this location, your child will discover the interactive world of Leo the Truck and enjoy many exciting adventures.

Main activities:
- Ice Cream Van
- Water Pipe Repair
- Car Wash
- Rocket Assembly and Space Travel
- Puzzles
- Coloring
- Memory cards (Match Game)
- Sickly Robot and Ambulance
- Water the Flowers
- Playground Construction
- River Bridge Repair
- The Lost Letters


Location “Scoop’s House”.
Explore the surroundings with the excavator Scoop, complete tasks, and have fun.

Main activities:
- Soccer Match
- Train and Station Assembly
- Railroad Repair
- Robot Base
- Hot Air Balloon
- Wind Turbine Repair
- Froggy Search
- Archaeological Excavation
- Kitten Rescue


Location “Lea’s Garage”.
Help Lea put everything in order and deal with all the problems.

Main activities:
- Fun Mini Races
- Tower Crane Assembly and Item Search
- Whack-a-Mole Game
- Help the Little Ship
- Submarine and Sunken Suitcase
- Road Clearing
- Item Sorting Junk Sorting
- Water Treatment Plant Repair
- Music Game


Natural Disasters.
In Leo’s World, children may encounter natural disasters just like in the real world. These events are unpredictable and come with their own challenges. However, with the assistance of the friendly helper cars, your child can learn to quickly extinguish forest fires, repair the damage caused by tornadoes, and tackle other exciting problems.


Our team creates fun and kind educational games for kids, based on original content that we create and produce in our own animation studios. All our content is created with the active participation of professionals who work with children, and is translated into many languages.
